item.title: Plan-IoT
item.dc:creator: SATRAI_ADMIN
item.description: PlanIoT is a middleware approach for enabling adaptive data flow management in IoT-enhanced spaces (e.g., buildings) using automated planning methodologies.Today’s sensorized spaces deploy applications falling to diverse categories such as analytics, real-time, transactional, video streaming and emergency response.Depending on the category, applications have different QoS requirements related to timely delivery, networking resources, accuracy, etc.Typically, state-of-the-art […]
